name: shorturl
description: FCC backend project: url shortener microservice

scripts.lstart: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3000 MONGODB_DB=url MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/url nodemon server.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test PORT=3000 MONGODB_DB=url MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/url mocha --timeout 10000 --sort
